TopicTitle: No usable comms devices on this vessel (when there are and in range)

Articles.Content:
Hi any.

This problem has been bugging me for a while now. every time i try and transmit science i get the message the there are "no usable comms devices on this vessel". i get this on all vessel types in career and sandbox.

Vessel: https://imgur.com/a/MiiDl6Y

Mod list: https://imgur.com/a/wr45Jvc

any ideas on how to fix this would be amazing.
